selectedEvents.title: Իշխանություն - 2
selectedEvents.info: «Իշխանություն II» ֆիլմը համանուն առաջին ֆիլմի շարունակությունն է: Գլխավոր հերոսը՝ Ալիսան, այս անգամ անցնելով կյանքի և մահվան եզրագծով, դավաճանություններ հաղթահարելով և դավադրություններ բացահայտելով հասնում է իր նպատակին:

selectedEvents.title: Վիշապ
selectedEvents.info: Ֆիլմի գլխավոր հերոսը Հայկն է։ Նա ուսանող է, որ լրացուցիչ աշխատում է սուրհանդակային ծառայությունում, պարբերաբար հայտնվում է տհաճ պատմությունների մեջ, իսկ վեճը համակուրսեցու հետ դառնում է հերթական անախորժությունը։

selectedOnlineContent.title: Luckiest Girl Alive
selectedOnlineContent.about: A woman in New York, who seems to have things under control, is faced with a trauma that makes her life unravel.

cinema.title: Անքնություն
cinema.info: Ֆիլմի գլխավոր հերոսը, ով ՏՏ ընկերության համահիմնադիր է, տառապում է անքնությամբ։Ուշ գիշերով հնչած սխալ զանգն ամբողջովին փոխում է նրա պատկերացումները բարու և չարի, կյանքի և մահվան մասին։

cinema.title: Վիշապ
cinema.info: Ֆիլմի գլխավոր հերոսը Հայկն է։ Նա ուսանող է, որ լրացուցիչ աշխատում է սուրհանդակային ծառայությունում, պարբերաբար հայտնվում է տհաճ պատմությունների մեջ, իսկ վեճը համակուրսեցու հետ դառնում է հերթական անախորժությունը։

cinema.title: Իշխանություն - 2
cinema.info: «Իշխանություն II» ֆիլմը համանուն առաջին ֆիլմի շարունակությունն է: Գլխավոր հերոսը՝ Ալիսան, այս անգամ անցնելով կյանքի և մահվան եզրագծով, դավաճանություններ հաղթահարելով և դավադրություններ բացահայտելով հասնում է իր նպատակին:

cinema.title: Մի անգամ դպրոցում
cinema.info: Ֆիլմը Տիգրանի մասին է, ով վատ շրջապատի ազդեցության տակ դրսևորում է իր բացասական կողմերը, հաճախակի հայտնվում է պատմությունների մեջ և չի սիրում սովորել:

cinema.title: Чёрная Пантера: Ваканда навсегда
cinema.info: После смерти короля Т`Чаллы королева Рамонда, Шури, М`Баку, Окойе и Дора Милаж сражаются, чтобы защитить Ваканду от мировых держав.

cinema.title: Ёлки 9
cinema.info: За считанные часы до праздника все с замиранием сердца надеются на чудо. Вся деревня Глухарево готовится с размахом встречать зарубежную кинозвезду.

cinema.title: Билет в рай
cinema.info: Разведённая пара вынуждена объединиться, чтобы поехать на Бали и помешать дочери Лили выйти замуж за местного парня.

upcomingEvents.title: Avatar 2
upcomingEvents.info: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Navi race to protect their planet.

upcomingEvents.title: John Wick
upcomingEvents.info: John Wick (Keanu Reeves) uncovers a path to defeating the High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes. Lionsgate presents, a Thunder Road Films / 87eleven production.

upcomingEvents.title: Ant-man
upcomingEvents.info: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne, along with Hank Pym and Janet Van Dyne, explore the Quantum Realm, where they interact with strange creatures and embark on an adventure that goes beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.

operaBallet.title: Chipolino
operaBallet.info: Conductor: Harutyun Arzumanyan Stage choreographer: Henrikh Majorov.

operaBallet.title: Concert performance of Puccini's opera Tosca
operaBallet.info: Concert performance of Giacomo Puccini's opera 'Tosca' with the participation of world opera stars in Aram Khachatryan concert hall. Floria Tosca - Hibla Gerzmava, soprano Mario Cavaradossi - Arsen Soghomonyan, tenor Scarpia - Vladislav Sulimski, baritone National Philharmonic Orchestra of Armenia, Artistic Director and Chief Conductor: Eduard Topchyan

operaBallet.title: Spartak
operaBallet.info: Spend a warm August evening at the Old Arena music hall with live music by Arp and the Hayway Band.

operaBallet.title: Karmen
operaBallet.info: Musical director and conductor of the performance: Karen Durgaryan /Honored Artist of RA/ Stage director: Armen Meliksetyan /Honored Art Worker of RA/ Set designer: Rafael Khachatryan

operaBallet.title: Forsh & Re Minor
operaBallet.info: Stage director: Gegham Griogoryan /People’s Artist of RA and RL/ Set designer: Grisha Sahakyan /Honored Art Worker of RA/ Chief choirmaster: Hrach Boryan Choreographer: Vilen Galstyan /People’s Artist of RA/

concert.title: Don't stop dreaming
concert.info: On November 25, at 19:00, the solo concert of the Yeva Sujyan & Black Gold Project group will take place at the Hovhannes Tumanyan Puppet Theater entitled 'Don't Stop Dreaming'. The special guests of the concert are Hasmik Karapetyan and Vahan Artsruni.

concert.title: An evening of author's song and poetry
concert.info: On November 25, an evening of original song and poetry at the Old Arena music hall. Sincere conversation and music, an exceptional evening for the soul and mind. The participation of all of you is extremely important. this time, too, we will direct the funds to an important cause, and the details on the spot. Hurry up to book your place.

concert.title: Yerevan Jazz Fest
concert.info: On November 25, within the framework of the Yerevan Jazz Festival, Arno Babajanyan Concert Hall will be hosting the leading pianists of Armenia.

concert.title: Grand Opening Concert
concert.info: Don’t miss Babylon Theatre’s reopening concert on November 25th! Bands: Rozen, Tal, TEELxSocko, VANAKAN

clubs&pabs.title: Forsh & Re Minor
clubs&pabs.info: Popular and recognized songs of our city performed by Forsh and Re Minor on November 20 at the Hin Areni music hall. A beautiful Yerevan evening, especially for you.

clubs&pabs.title: Aramo and Emma Petrosyan
clubs&pabs.info: On November 23, Aramon and Emma Petrosyan, one of the most beautiful couples of Armenian singing, will perform popular and beautiful performances in the music hall of the Old Arena.

clubs&pabs.title: Arpi & HayWay Band
clubs&pabs.info: Spend a warm August evening at the Old Arena music hall with live music by Arp and the Hayway Band.

clubs&pabs.title: Arthur & Arsen Safaryans
clubs&pabs.info: Arsen and Arthur Safaryan Beloved, soulful performances performed by popular singers. On November 24, spend a wonderful evening at the Old Arena Music Hall. Places are limited.

clubs&pabs.title: Watch FIFA World Cup 2022 matches on Astral
clubs&pabs.info: If you still haven't decided where to watch Fifa2022 games, then we have a good offer. Starting from November 20, every day we invite you to watch the most anticipated football championship with your friends on 3 exceptionally large screens. Interesting surprises and hospitality await football-loving guests. Let's spend the crazy and tense month together. Entrance is FREE.

theater.title: Birth certificate
theater.info: History of the origin and formation of the Armenian people, where the answers to the most pressing questions of our birth certificate will be heard.

theater.title: Aladin
theater.info: Musical fairy tale from part 1. The play is a stage version of a well-known fairy tale. This musical performance promises magic, fireworks of colors, spectacle and endless joy. This is a tale about Aladdin's magic lamp and how all our dreams can come true.

theater.title: Backstage or Anatomy of the Theatre
theater.info: In a happy and carefree atmosphere, we will try to travel together in the world of theater and discover unknown sides to the audience. This play features the real stories of the actors, intrigue, secrets and, of course, endless laughs.

theater.title: Paplik
theater.info: Ardent patriotism often evaporates when it collides with one's self-interest. Look for the stage version of Guy de Maupassant's The Fat Ball, one of the pillars of classical literature, in our playbook under the title The Dumpling.

theater.title: Stayed home
theater.info: A new mono performance by Tamara Petrosyan. The actress will present the interesting, sometimes nerve-wracking, but always up-to-date theme of staying at home in all its nuances with her special humorous prism.

online.title: Smile
online.about: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, Dr. Rose Cotter starts experiencing frightening occurrences that she can't explain. Rose must confront her troubling past in order to survive and escape her horrifying new reality.

online.title: Elvis
online.about: The life of American music icon Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.

online.title: Luckiest Girl Alive
online.about: A woman in New York, who seems to have things under control, is faced with a trauma that makes her life unravel.

online.title: Ticket to Paradise
online.about: Pete  Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous

online.title: Terrifier 2
online.about: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to the timid town of Miles County where he targets a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.

online.title: Black Adam
online.about: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

online.title: The Woman King
online.about: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.

online.title: Halloween Ends
online.about: The saga of Michael Myers and Laurie Strode comes to a spine-chilling climax in the final installment of this trilogy.

online.title: The Good Nurse
online.about: An infamous caregiver is implicated in the deaths of hundreds of hospital patients.

online.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
online.about: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

online.title: Enola Holmes 2
online.about: Now a detective-for-hire, Enola Holmes takes on her first official case to find a missing girl as the sparks of a dangerous conspiracy ignite a mystery that requires the help of friends - and Sherlock himself - to unravel.

online.title: Bullet Train
online.about: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

online.title: Barbarian
online.about: A woman staying at an Airbnb discovers that the house she has rented is not what it seems.

online.title: The Menu
online.about: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

online.title: Slumberland
online.about: A young girl discovers a secret map to the dreamworld of Slumberland, and with the help of an eccentric outlaw, she traverses dreams and flees nightmares, with the hope that she will be able to see her late father again.

online.title: Amsterdam
online.about: In the 1930s, three friends witness a murder, are framed for it, and uncover one of the most outrageous plots in American history.

online.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
online.about: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.

online.title: Till
online.about: In 1955, after Emmett Till is murdered in a brutal lynching, his mother vows to expose the racism behind the attack while working to have those involved brought to justice.

online.title: The School for Good and Evil
online.about: Best friends Sophie and Agatha find themselves on opposing sides of an epic battle when they're swept away into an enchanted school where aspiring heroes and villains are trained to protect the balance between Good and Evil.

online.title: Blonde
online.about: A fictionalized chronicle of the inner life of Marilyn Monroe.

online.title: The Gray Man
online.about: When the CIA's most skilled operative-whose true identity is known to none-accidentally uncovers dark agency secrets, a psychopathic former colleague puts a bounty on his head, setting off a global manhunt by international assassins.

online.title: My Policeman
online.about: The arrival of Patrick into Marion and Tom's home triggers the exploration of seismic events from 40 years previously.

online.title: Do Revenge
online.about: Drea and Eleanor agree to go after one another's bullies.

online.title: After Ever Happy
online.about: As a shocking truth about a couple's families emerges, the two lovers discover they are not so different from each other. Tessa is no longer the sweet, simple, good girl she was when she met Hardin — any more than he is the cruel, moody boy she fell so hard for.

online.title: Halloween Ends
online.about: The saga of Michael Myers and Laurie Strode comes to a spine-chilling climax in the final installment of this trilogy.

online.title: Fall
online.about: Best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves at the top of a 2,000-foot radio tower.

online.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
online.about: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

online.title: See How They Run
online.about: In the West End of 1950s London, plans for a movie version of a smash-hit play come to an abrupt halt after a pivotal member of the crew is murdered.

online.title: The Greatest Beer Run Ever
online.about: A man's story of leaving New York in 1967 to bring beer to his childhood buddies in the Army while they are fighting in Vietnam.

online.title: Thirteen Lives
online.about: A rescue mission is assembled in Thailand where a group of young boys and their soccer coach are trapped in a system of underground caves that are flooding.

online.title: Prey
online.about: Naru, a skilled warrior of the Comanche Nation, fights to protect her tribe against one of the first highly-evolved Predators to land on Earth.

online.title: Lifemark
online.about: David's comfortable world is turned upside down when his birthmother unexpectedly reaches out to him, longing to meet the 18-year-old son she's only held once.

online.title: Prey for the Devil
online.about: A nun prepares to perform an exorcism and comes face to face with a demonic force with mysterious ties to her past.

online.title: She Said
online.about: New York Times reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor break one of the most important stories in a generation - a story that helped ignite a movement and shattered decades of silence around the subject of sexual assault in Hollywood.

online.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
online.about: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

online.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
online.about: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

online.title: Don't Worry Darling
online.about: A 1950s housewife living with her husband in a utopian experimental community begins to worry that his glamorous company could be hiding disturbing secrets.

online.title: Pearl
online.about: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

online.title: The Batman
online.about: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

online.title: Lightyear
online.about: While spending years attempting to return home, marooned Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear encounters an army of ruthless robots commanded by Zurg who are attempting to steal his fuel source.

online.title: Nope
online.about: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

online.title: Hocus Pocus 2
online.about: Two young women accidentally bring back the Sanderson Sisters to modern day Salem and must figure out how to stop the child-hungry witches from wreaking havoc on the world.

online.title: Lifemark
online.about: David's comfortable world is turned upside down when his birthmother unexpectedly reaches out to him, longing to meet the 18-year-old son she's only held once.

online.title: The Black Phone
online.about: After being abducted by a child killer and locked in a soundproof basement, a 13-year-old boy starts receiving calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.

online.title: Bullet Train
online.about: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

online.title: Armageddon Time
online.about: A deeply personal coming-of-age story about the strength of family and the generational pursuit of the American Dream.

online.title: The Good Nurse
online.about: An infamous caregiver is implicated in the deaths of hundreds of hospital patients.

online.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
online.about: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

online.title: My Son Hunter
online.about: Fictional retelling of the lifestyle and scandals of Hunter Biden, son of US President Joe Biden.

online.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
online.about: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

online.title: After Ever Happy
online.about: As a shocking truth about a couple's families emerges, the two lovers discover they are not so different from each other. Tessa is no longer the sweet, simple, good girl she was when she met Hardin — any more than he is the cruel, moody boy she fell so hard for.

online.about: Best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves at the top of a 2,000-foot radio tower.

online.title: The Greatest Beer Run Ever
online.about: A man's story of leaving New York in 1967 to bring beer to his childhood buddies in the Army while they are fighting in Vietnam.

online.title: Vay Grig Grig
online.about: Հայաստանի բոլոր ժամանակների ամենամեծ սթենդ ափ ներկայացումը:

online.title: Retro jazz
online.about: The State Jazz Orchestra of Armenia under the direction of Armen Husnunts will hold a concert on February 19 – a musical journey into the first half of the 20th century, the golden age of great jazz bands.

online.title: Sevak Khanagyan
online.about: Նա արդեն գերել է իր հանդիսատեսին:Նրա երգերն արդեն սիրված են:Նրան միշտ սպասում են մենահամերգներով:Սևակ Խանաղյան:

online.title: Love Odd
online.about: Two friends, Aram and Rafo, who have a joint business decide to raise money to save it. They decide to resort to fraud related to the women's tennis match in order to get out of the hopeless situation. One of them, who is in love with one of the tennis players however, wants to marry Aghvan's daughter, Piruz, who is a local authority. The romantic hero is persecuted and falls in love with Piruz, his father Aghvan, and the latter's wife, Zhanna, who tries to seduce the hero.

online.title: Aram MP3
online.about: Մենահամերգ - Aram Mp3
